Hello Thendral,

What you need is very simple.

First of all, the checkbox should be places in the wpf window grid, not inside the ddd control.

Then, set to true or false thethe visibility property of the linegraph in the check/uncheck event of the checkbox.  Something like this:


private void checkbox1_Checked(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
        {
           plot1.LineGraph.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;         
        }
private void checkbox1_Unchecked(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
        {
            plot1.LineGraph.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden;                        
        }

If you need me to be more explicit on how to get to the property let me know.
